item.title: Wed, 18 Jun 2025 13:31:52 UTC
item.description:
I added Mopidy and some extensionsâ€”just the ones I need.
If you have suggestions, encounter issues, or want other extensions
(though I might not be able to test them), let me know.
Happy Music!
